comment: This Professor grades extremely heavy on writing assignments but will be clear as to what you need to change, you will have to do plenty of interviewing for these writing assignments
If you like to be singled out and humiliated by professors, then take his class.  Avoid him for your own sanity.

Witt is hit or miss. I agree that he seems to grade on favoritism or whether he likes you or not. I worked hard, so I believe I deserved my A, but I could tell he favored me, too, which annoyed me. He could also be passive-aggressive and unnecessarily critical/harsh when going over people's stories, & is a bit avoidant, doesn't respond to emails.
Laid Back and works with you.  NO exams. Your grade is based on participation and 3 feature stories which he gives you many opportunities to get the grade you desire on it.
Take Advanced Feature Writing with Len. He knows his stuff from the "real world" and - if you're willing - he will teach it to you. Is an expert on civil journalism, you'll learn this, too.
